thread.title: Pod: a nightmare.
thread.title_full: Pod: a nightmare. - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Frank B
title: Pod: a nightmare.
text: Hotel website there's nothing to do with the reality. A ridiculous tiny room, unbereable for a couple and with tainted and unwashed towels. It's impossible to stay there. There is no privacy betweeen the room and the bathroom with a transparent glass that leave you exposed at your intimacy. Service is no good either, with a unefficient staff. The restaurant is dark, noisy and smells bad. And you don' t even get to choose your food to take the room. They give you a small menu to go with just a few dishes choice. If you want an adventure and the sensation of being camping or in a hostel, that's ok. If you prefer dignity and good sense, don't even get close of Pod Hotels
